metadata.title: RHSA-2018:3757: rh-postgresql10-postgresql security update (Important)
metadata.description:
PostgreSQL is an advanced object-relational database management system (DBMS).

The following packages have been upgraded to a later upstream version: rh-postgresql10-postgresql (10.6). (BZ#1649369)

Security Fix(es):

* postgresql: SQL injection in pg_upgrade and pg_dump, via CREATE TRIGGER ... REFERENCING (CVE-2018-16850)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

bugzilla.text: CVE-2018-16850 postgresql: SQL injection in pg_upgrade and pg_dump, via CREATE TRIGGER ... REFERENCING

platform: Red Hat Software Collections for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7
Red Hat Software Collections for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.4 EUS
Red Hat Software Collections for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.5 EUS
Red Hat Software Collections for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.6 EUS
